name: Wild Moose
headline: Automating root cause analysis with generative AI
description:
Wild Moose automatically kicks off any root-cause investigation to improve MTTR.
Our AI triages issues, analyzes impact, and suggests next steps - all before human intervention is needed.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Yasmin Dunsky, Founder
founders.description: Yasmin holds an MBA from Stanford, and has a successful track record in founding and leading ventures, including an ecosystem that trains thousands of female software developers across Israel. She served as an analyst for the Israeli Special Forces Intelligence and holds a BSc in Computer Science from The Hebrew University.

founders.name: Roei Schuster, Founder
founders.description: I'm the CTO of Wild Moose. Before, I was a post-doc at the Vector Institute of AI, after completing a PhD at Cornell and Tel Aviv University. My research focused on security and privacy of AI, and particularly NLP. Before my that, I did my undergrad at the Technion, and served in IDF's 8200 alongside my cofounder Tom.

founders.name: Tom Tytunovich, Founder
founders.description: Building software stuff since 2002. In the IDF's Intelligence Corps, in tiny startups and large corporations as software developer, architect, and engineering manager, as CTO of a nonprofit building technology with people who are homeless in NY, and now as co-founder of Wild Moose.

### Over reliance on tribal knowledge and SMEs
Tagline
## Quickly Identify Root Causes with Real-Time Production Data

## The go-to solution for those who don’t have time for guesswork
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
Wild Moose changes how companies handle incidents. Before, we were buried in noise during outages. Now, the AI cuts through it all, giving you exactly what we need when you need it. I wish I’d had Wild Moose throughout my entire career!
![Remy edberg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673321a9408a76b8c4b4d0c2/67575f4367de075b460e12d8_remy_edberg_2.avif)
Jeremy Edberg
First SRE at Netflix and Reddit
As teams scale and systems grow more complex, response times become critical. Wild Moose makes it easier by automating root-cause analysis - and giving teams the operational context they need to act fast, right when things are at their worst.
![Arash Ferdowsi](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673321a9408a76b8c4b4d0c2/67575f43478ac40c5198ec55_Arash_ferdowsi_1.avif)
Arash Ferdowsi
Founding CTO at Dropbox
With Wild Moose, the cognitive load on your team is drastically reduced. Their AI handles routine tasks, freeing up engineers to tackle the challenges that truly require human intelligence.
![Arnie Katz](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673321a9408a76b8c4b4d0c2/67575f43dbf966ec6998a80c_Arnie_Katz_2.avif)
Arnie Katz
CPTO at GoFundMe
Real Time Data Extraction
## From chaotic alerts to actionable clarity
![Illustration of Wild Moose's Real Time Data Extraction process](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673321a9408a76b8c4b4d0c2/6761e09d8711c72a2c6c896c_illustration_how-it-works.avif)
Wild Moose integrates within minutes via APIs, providing coverage across observability tools, deployment platforms, cloud services, and knowledge bases—all without the need for agent installation or ongoing maintenance.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
## Seamless Connectivity, Zero Downtime
FAQs
## Common questions about Wild Moose
Which tools can Wild Moose integrate with?
Wild Moose integrates with a wide range of tools across observability, ticketing, knowledge bases, databases, and code repositories. We already support dozens of integrations and are continuously adding more to fit your tech stack.
How does Wild Moose handle data security?
Customer data is not retained outside of your network, and we ensure end-to-end encryption at all times. We have Data Processor Agreements (DPAs) with our LLM providers to prevent the use or storage of data for training purposes. For Business and Enterprise customers, we offer an on-premise version to ensure that data remains within your network. All systems are SOC 2-compliant. For more details, visit our [Trust Center.](https://wildmoose.ai/<https:/app.drata.com/trust/9cb64ddc-0c38-11ee-865f-029d78a187d9>)
Will Wild Moose fit into my workflow?
Absolutely. Wild Moose is designed to work seamlessly with your existing observability and alerting tools, enhancing them with automation and actionable insights without disrupting your current processes.
How do I set up Wild Moose?
Setting up Wild Moose is quick and easy—just provide API access to your core observability tools, and you're ready to go within minutes. Book a demo to get started and connect your systems.
Which plan is right for me?
Wild Moose offers tiered pricing based on system complexity and event volume. We'll help you choose the best plan for your team. Book a demo to discuss your needs and get a custom recommendation.
Do I need to prepare my data or monitoring tools before using Wild Moose?
No preparation required. Our AI-powered technology can handle unstructured data and provides a smooth experience, no matter how your information is stored.
## Security You Can Trust, Without Compromise.
![Soc 2 badge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673321a9408a76b8c4b4d0c2/673b847eadaf5749501df10a_Soc2-badge.avif)
### Customer data is not retained outside of your network
### End-to-end user encryption at all times.
### Data is not used or stored for training purposes

generated_description:
**Wild Moose: Your SRE Copilot**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, Wild Moose is a New York-based startup specializing in automating root cause analysis through generative AI. With a team of just three, they’re already making a significant impact in the world of Site Reliability Engineering (SRE). Their mission? To streamline incident response and reduce Mean Time to Recovery (MTTR) in a landscape where speed is critical.

**How It Works**

Wild Moose takes the tedious grunt work out of incident management. While outages can often bury teams under an avalanche of alerts, Wild Moose steps in to triage issues, analyze impacts, and suggest actionable next steps automatically—before human intervention is even required. The AI efficiently gathers and analyzes logs, metrics, and code, pinpointing root causes swiftly and effectively.

Gone are the days of relying solely on tribal knowledge or scrambling during crises. With Wild Moose, teams can create customized playbooks that navigate complex environments based on real-time production data. It's all about cutting through the noise, allowing engineers to focus on higher value tasks instead of being bogged down by routine issues.

**Integration and Security**

One of the standout features of Wild Moose is its seamless integration. It can connect to a wide array of observability tools and cloud services within minutes via APIs—no lengthy installations or maintenance required. On the security front, Wild Moose is designed to prioritize user data protection, ensuring that customer data is never retained outside of their network and that every interaction is safeguarded with end-to-end encryption.

**The Future of Incident Management**

The testimonials from industry leaders speak volumes about Wild Moose’s potential. Figures like Jeremy Edberg (first SRE at Netflix and Reddit) and Arash Ferdowsi (founding CTO at Dropbox) highlight how Wild Moose cuts through incident response chaos, fundamentally altering how companies manage their operational challenges.

In an era where software systems are increasingly complex and downtime is intolerable, Wild Moose offers a clear path forward: eliminate guesswork and let AI do the heavy lifting. They’re not just another tool in the toolbox; they’re rethinking what it means to manage incidents in real-time.

For anyone interested in leveraging this innovative AI for enhanced incident response, demos and more information can be found on their website: [Wild Moose](https://wildmoose.ai).
